title: Spore Collection [ENG] Lossless Repack
description:
This torrent features the first English repack of "Spore". It includes both the add-on "Spore: Galactic Adventures" as well as the DLC "Spore: Creepy & Cute". It has already been cracked and activated. Please note that you won't be able to play the game in English properly if you do not have an English OS installed on your PC. I have been unable to fix this issue because it was programmed to be this way.


If you enjoyed the game, you can support the developers by buying it legally. :-)
